tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sound_library (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  description TEXT,
  category TEXT,
  duration FLOAT,
  tags TEXT,
  file_path TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sound_effects (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    duration FLOAT,
    file_path VARCHAR(255),
    upload_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE samples (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    type VARCHAR(50),
    duration FLOAT,
    file_path VARCHAR(255),
    upload_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE sound_effects (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    duration INTERVAL NOT NULL,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE samples (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    duration INTERVAL NOT NULL,
    size INT NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE metadata (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sound_effect_id INT NOT NULL,
    sample_id INT NOT NULL,
    genre VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    mood VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE sound_effects (
  sound_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sound_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  duration INT,
  file_path TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE sample_libraries (
  library_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  library_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  theme VARCHAR(50),
  creation_date DATE,
  total_samples INT
);

CREATE TABLE sound_effect_tags (
  sound_id INT,
  tag_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (sound_id, tag_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (sound_id) REFERENCES sound_effects (sound_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES tags (tag_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sound_effects (
	sound_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	sound_name TEXT NOT NULL,
	category TEXT,
	format TEXT,
	size INT,
	duration DOUBLE
);

CREATE TABLE sound_effect_tags (
	sound_id INT,
	tag_id INT,
	PRIMARY KEY (sound_id, tag_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (sound_id) REFERENCES sound_effects(sound_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES tags(tag_id)
);

CREATE TABLE library_content (
	library_id INT,
	sound_id INT,
	PRIMARY KEY (library_id, sound_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (library_id) REFERENCES sample_libraries(library_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (sound_id) REFERENCES sound_effects(sound_id)
);
